choices.answer: How did He get here and when?
Are you the Messiah and what miracles?
How did you walk on water and feed 5000
Where did you go and will you feed us again

questions.question: What were the people's burning questions when they finally found Christ on the other side?

choices.answer: He was searching for what God was saying
He was waiting for the disciples to answer

questions.question: Why didn't Jesus answer their question immediately?
Why were the people's motives wrong?

choices.answer: They wanted to repent of their sins
They wanted to really see if He is the Messiah
They wanted to make him king now
Proof that He was the Messiah

questions.question: Ultimately, what were the people wanting from Jesus?
To which patriarch did the people compare Christ in His miracle of feeding the 5000?
Natural man say, "Show me and then I'll believe" but God says

choices.answer: Believe and then you will know
Believe and all will be fixed
You will trust after I show you

questions.question: Christ delivered His discourse on the Bread of Life on the seashore near Capernaum
Christ delivered this message on the afternoon of the same day that he fed the 5000
The people misunderstood Christ's message to be "work in order to receive everlasting life
